{xtype:"button",ui:"normal",text:"QR Code scannen",id:"qrscan",handler:function(){var a=cordova.plugins.barcodeScanner;a.scan(function(b){alert("We got a barcode Result: "+b.text+" Format: "+b.format+" Cancelled: "+b.cancelled)},function(b){alert("Scanning failed: "+b)})}},{xtype:"button",ui:"normal",text:"QR Code erstellen",id:"qrencode",handler:function(){var a=cordova.plugins.barcodeScanner;a.encode(a.Encode.TEXT_TYPE,Ext.ComponentQuery.query("#qrinput")[0].getValue(),function(b){alert("encode success: "+b)},function(b){alert("encoding failed: "+b)})}},{xtype:"textfield",ui:"normal",id:"qrinput"}],navigationBar:{items:[{xtype:"button",text:"Logout",align:"right",handler:function(){var a=Ext.ComponentQuery.query("toppanel")[0];a.animateActiveItem(0,{type:"flip"})}}],docked:"top"},html:["
